{/* Hero Section */}

Stay Safe, Secure, and Independent in Your Own Home

Don't let fear keep you from living fully. Our AI-powered home safety assessments help you maintain your independence and dignity while giving your family peace of mind.

Scan your home with our app and get instant safety recommendations

How It Works

Three simple steps to freedom and safety in your own home

Scan Your Home

Use our app to scan rooms and create a 3D model of your home

Get Connected

Why Choose HOMEase?

Regain confidence and maintain your independence

Peace of Mind

Give your family peace of mind knowing you're safe and secure at home

👥

Expert Support

Connect with qualified contractors who understand aging-in-place needs
